backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, daily inputs, journaling, squad groups, and abuse reporting with access‑controlled query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated high‑level descriptions of numerous frontend files, covering routing, UI components, onboarding, guidelines, missions, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme OKLCH color tokens and global layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root mount node, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React router and query‑client setup wiring all major app routes through the AppShell layout and error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/assessments/Asse: Interactive questionnaire component with progress tracking, navigation, and answer validation that submits collected responses.
frontend/src/components/assessments/Outc: Displays assessment outcome content in cards, including text, briefing alerts, and interactive scenario choices.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Renders a branded header banner with emblem, title, and optional subtext for the Dagger Brigade H2F app.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/CoachA: Generates and displays prioritized coaching actions based on the latest daily input and readiness thresholds.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyL: Daily input form with sliders for key readiness factors and optional guidance, submitting values for processing.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Gamifi: Shows performance tier, streak status, and earned badges based on user streaks and latest overall score.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Readin: Displays overall readiness score, factor breakdowns, streaks, and optional analysis text using progress bars and color tiers.
frontend/src/components/fieldMode/FieldM: Toggle switch that enables or disables Field Mode using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/izof/AfterTaskRe: Form for recording performance outcome and reflection, updating an IZOF entry on submit.
frontend/src/components/izof/CoachViewPa: Coach-facing summary showing weekly averages, in‑zone frequency, and emotion category counts derived from IZOF entries.
frontend/src/components/izof/CrossFactor: Generates and displays cross‑factor insights from IZOF entries, daily inputs, and sleep data, including missing‑data prompts.
frontend/src/components/izof/DailyZoneCh: Form to capture stress rating, emotions, and upcoming task, validating inputs and generating an IZOF recommendation.
frontend/src/components/izof/RegulationD: Interactive slider that categorizes current stress level relative to estimated IZOF range and provides regulation guidance.
frontend/src/components/izof/StressOutco: Shows computed correlation between stress levels and performance outcomes, or prompts for more data if insufficient.
frontend/src/components/izof/StressTrend: Renders an SVG line chart of stress ratings over time with labeled axes and color-coded data points.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Provides a form to create, edit, or delete local journal entries with save validation and confirmation dialogs.
Defines the main application layout with sidebar navigation, user profile controls, and responsive behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageScaff: Wraps page content with optional title, description, actions, and configurable max-width styling.
frontend/src/components/missions/Mission: Displays a mission card with title, briefing, unlock rules, win conditions, XP rewards, and completion status.
Shows mission results including pass/fail status, score, XP earned, win condition outcomes, and optional reflection action.
Runs mission steps, tracks choices and scoring, handles timed steps, and outputs a final mission result.
frontend/src/components/missions/Operato: Shows operator rank, XP progress, and unlocked items using badges and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Guides new users through display name setup, optional questions, and required disclaimer and guidelines acceptance.
frontend/src/components/reports/Personal: Form dialog for creating, editing, and submitting personal reports with metadata and XP calculation.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportDi: Dialog for reporting users or entries with selectable reasons and optional details.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareProdu: Displays the production URL, copy button, and downloadable QR code for sharing the app.
frontend/src/components/sleepPerformance: Expandable module presenting leader sleep doctrine sections from static content.
frontend/src/components/SoldierConnect/F: Dialog component that allows users to locally flag content with a reason and optional notes.
frontend/src/components/SoldierConnect/R: Reaction bar rendering four reaction types with counts and callbacks, supporting compact and full layouts.
frontend/src/components/system/AppStartu: Full-screen error state with message, optional retry button, and troubleshooting note.
frontend/src/components/system/InitWarni: Banner that displays a yellow warning message if provided.
frontend/src/components/system/RouteErro: Error boundary that shows an app startup error state and allows retry on route errors.
frontend/src/components/tools/MilitaryAp: React dialog component showing full details for a military app including tags, usage info, and download links.
frontend/src/config/productionUrl.ts: Exports a function that returns the production URL using an env variable or window location as fallback.
Defines descriptive content and interactive insights for assessment outcomes, primarily OCEAN traits.
frontend/src/content/assessments.ts: Defines assessment metadata and question sets for multiple personality and resilience assessments.
Documentation explaining assessment module flow, data structures, scoring logic, and how to extend assessments.
frontend/src/content/atp6225LeaderSleepD: Static structured content summarizing leader sleep doctrine from ATP 6-22.5 with multiple sections.
frontend/src/content/dailyFactorGuidance: Provides anchor-based guidance for rating daily factors like sleep, training, stress, and pain on a 0–100 scale.
frontend/src/content/dailyQuotes.ts: Defines a DailyQuote interface and a list of motivational quotes with metadata and annotations, using generateQuoteId to assign IDs.
frontend/src/content/disclaimer.ts: Exports a disclaimer text clarifying the app is unofficial and reminding users of OPSEC responsibilities.
frontend/src/content/izofEducation.ts: Provides structured educational content explaining IZOF, eustress vs distress, individuality, and real‑world examples.
frontend/src/content/izofRegulationSkill: Lists techniques for increasing and decreasing arousal to help users regulate stress levels.
frontend/src/content/leaderGuidance.ts: Defines leader guidance structures and provides role, communication, friction, and coaching recommendations for various assessment patterns.
frontend/src/content/mentalPerformance/f: Provides Libby usage guidance and a catalog of free mental‑performance and support apps for soldiers.
frontend/src/content/mentalPerformance/r: Defines recommended reading content, including Libby access instructions and a detailed book list with themes and actions.
frontend/src/content/modules.ts: Defines mission content including scenarios, decisions, timed steps, rewards, and reflection prompts.
frontend/src/content/sleepPerformanceCop: Provides static copy for sleep performance UI, including insights, mode descriptions, education tiles, and routines.
Lists military-related apps with descriptions, usage notes, download links, and tags.
frontend/src/contexts/DashboardRefreshCo: Implements a React context to trigger dashboard refreshes via a refresh token counter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssessments.ts: Manages local assessment storage, retrieval, trends, and unlock helpers using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboard.ts: Handles local daily readiness input submission, scoring, streaks, and state retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useFieldMode.ts: Stores and toggles a field-mode flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Detects whether the viewport width is below a breakpoint for responsive UI behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useIzof.ts: Manages IZOF daily check entries with local storage integration, creation, updates, and derived IZOF guidance.
frontend/src/hooks/useIzofSettings.ts: Loads and updates per-profile IZOF settings such as coach view and range overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useLifeLessonsProgres: Empty placeholder hook file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalData.ts: Wraps localDataStore with React hooks for journals, daily inputs, and readiness state scoped to the current profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Provides access to the device-scoped local profile with update, reset, and onboarding-state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalReports.ts: Manages local personal reports including creation, updates, deletion, submission, and XP grant integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionProgression: Tracks and updates mission progression, XP, ranks, unlockables, and mission history in local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks online/offline browser status via window event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductionUrl.ts: Resolves the production URL from config and optionally fetches a backend-provided live link.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend-dependent squad/group operations with graceful fallback when offline.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuoteReflections.t: Loads and saves per-quote reflections tied to the local profile, exposing reflection state and a save function.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingProgress.ts: Tracks per-book reading status in localStorage and provides helpers to update status and query completed or in‑progress books.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingRewards.ts: Grants XP and badges for reading milestones with local deduplication and mission progression integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepPerformance.t: Manages sleep and caffeine logs with derived performance metrics and unlockable nap durations stored per profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoldierConnect.ts: Handles all Soldier Connect state and content operations with local persistence and XP rewards.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, mobile-safe rules, and utility classes for readiness and field mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it in InternetIdentity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReports.tsx: Admin interface to list abuse reports, show statuses, and update them with backend connectivity checks.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentHistory.tsx: Displays per‑assessment history and trend analysis using locally stored results with tabs for each assessment.
Shows leader-focused guidance derived from the user’s latest assessment outcomes, with role and coaching insights.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentResults.tsx: Presents the computed assessment outcome, scores, briefing content, and navigation to historical trends.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentRun.tsx: Runs an assessment questionnaire, scores answers, saves results locally, applies rewards, and navigates to results.
frontend/src/pages/Assessments.tsx: Entry page listing all assessments with completion status and links to history, leader view, and individual runs.
frontend/src/pages/DailyDashboard.tsx: Dashboard displaying readiness data, daily input logging, gamification, coach actions, and a scheduling form with online/offline handling.
frontend/src/pages/DailyQuotes.tsx: Shows a rotating daily quote and allows users to write and save personal reflections locally.
frontend/src/pages/FreeSoldierApps.tsx: Lists free wellness and resilience apps for soldiers with filtering, expandable details, and a Libby access guide.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Manages user squads, letting users view, create, and join groups via dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/GroupSharedEntries.ts: Displays a squad’s shared entries with member info, reporting, invite code management, and leave-group actions.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Fetches and displays community guidelines with a simple loading state and static content.
frontend/src/pages/IZOF.tsx: Main IZOF landing page providing navigation to zone checks, education, regulation skills, dashboard, and coach-view toggle.
frontend/src/pages/IZOFDailyZoneCheck.ts: Handles the daily stress check flow, showing forms, saved entries, and optional after-task reflections.
frontend/src/pages/IZOFEducation.tsx: Displays static IZOF educational content with multiple sections pulled from predefined content.
Shows arousal-regulation techniques and includes a helper tool for choosing appropriate skills.
frontend/src/pages/IZOFStressReadinessDa: Dashboard visualizing stress trends, IZOF range estimates, pattern detection, and correlations using user entries.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Local-only journal allowing creation, editing, and listing of entries with optional prefilled data.
frontend/src/pages/LifeLessonsRemoved.ts: Placeholder page explaining removal of the Life Lessons section and linking to alternative resources.
frontend/src/pages/MentalPerformanceRead: Reading page with Libby guide, expandable book cards, and local progress and rewards tracking.
frontend/src/pages/MilitaryApps.tsx: Searchable, filterable directory of military apps with detail dialog support.
frontend/src/pages/MissionRun.tsx: Runs a mission by ID, handles completion flow, and shows mission debrief and reflection options.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Mission browser with category tabs, mission cards, and operator progression panel.
frontend/src/pages/MotivationalLifeLesso: Empty file placeholder for a motivational life lessons page.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLanding.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the public landing page.
frontend/src/pages/Reports.tsx: Personal reports page with creation, editing, deletion, and XP display for reflections.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAbout.tsx: Settings page for managing local profile, display name, device ID, and data reset.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceActio: UI for logging caffeine, viewing mode-based guidance, and getting sleep and nap recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceAnaly: Displays sleep debt metrics and maps them to performance impacts with visual indicators.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceCheck: Form for logging a sleep session with optional pain and stress inputs.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceDashb: Dashboard summarizing sleep metrics, readiness, debt, and mode settings with navigation to actions.
frontend/src/pages/SoldierConnect/Soldie: Landing page listing Soldier Connect sections with counts and navigation.
Layout wrapper providing navigation tabs and routing for Soldier Connect pages.
frontend/src/pages/Squads.tsx: Empty file placeholder for squads page.
frontend/src/pages/SquadSharedEntries.ts: Empty file placeholder for squad shared entries page.
frontend/src/types/assessments.ts: Type definitions for assessment configurations, questions, scoring, outcomes, and stored results.
frontend/src/types/izof.ts: Defines IZOF-related types for stress tracking, emotion categories, task types, and daily zone check entries.
frontend/src/types/legacy.ts: Contains legacy types for journaling, groups, reports, and older IZOF and personal report models used for compatibility.
frontend/src/types/mentalPerformance.ts: Provides type definitions for mental performance content modules, including app cards, tags, and Libby guide structures.
frontend/src/types/militaryApps.ts: Defines types for military app listings with tags, download links, and basic metadata.
frontend/src/types/missions.ts: Describes mission structures, steps, rewards, unlock rules, and progression logic including rank calculation.
frontend/src/types/motivationalVideos.ts: Empty placeholder file for motivational video types.
frontend/src/types/personalReports.ts: Defines types for personal video/book reports and input structures for creating or updating them.
frontend/src/types/soldierConnect.ts: Specifies all Soldier Connect community types including threads, stories, mentor notes, challenges, reactions, and notifications.
frontend/src/utils/assessmentScoring.ts: Implements scoring logic for dimensional, type-based, and band assessments producing structured outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Maps backend errors to simplified user-friendly messages with suggested actions.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a safe clipboard copy utility with fallback for unsupported browsers.
frontend/src/utils/dailyRotation.ts: Generates a deterministic daily index based on hashed local date.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCode.ts: Normalizes invite codes by trimming whitespace.
frontend/src/utils/izofAnalytics.ts: Offers local analytics for IZOF entries including trends, correlations, pattern detection, and weekly aggregations.
frontend/src/utils/izofIntegration.ts: Combines IZOF stress, training load, and sleep data to generate cross‑factor insights and detect missing inputs.
frontend/src/utils/izofLogic.ts: Provides IZOF range estimation, stress‑zone recommendations, state categorization, and validation for daily zone checks.
frontend/src/utils/localDataStore.ts: Handles localStorage persistence for journals, readiness inputs, sleep logs, caffeine logs, IZOF data, and related local-only types.
frontend/src/utils/localProfileStorage.t: Manages creation, retrieval, update, and reset of device-scoped user profiles in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/militaryAppsFilter.ts: Filters military apps by selected tag and search query across name, description, usage, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/qrcode.ts: Generates QR codes on a canvas via an external API with a fallback renderer and supports PNG download.
frontend/src/utils/quoteId.ts: Creates deterministic quote IDs using a simple hash of quote text and author.
frontend/src/utils/readinessSemantics.ts: Maps factor scores to readiness-friendly values and color classes based on polarity and provides band-based explanation selection.
frontend/src/utils/reportXp.ts: Computes XP for reports using deterministic thresholds based on character length.
frontend/src/utils/sleepPerformance.ts: Computes sleep debt and related performance metrics, formats sleep windows, and provides caffeine clearance and pain/stress guidance utilities.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectDeepLin: Builds and parses deep links for Soldier Connect threads and stories using URL query parameters.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectNotific: Generates local notifications for Soldier Connect events like replies, highlights, mentor notes, and challenge reminders.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectStore.t: Manages Soldier Connect local storage state and provides CRUD operations for threads, stories, replies, and related metadata.
frontend/src/utils/soldierConnectXp.ts: Defines XP values and functions to compute XP for various Soldier Connect actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validateMotivationalV: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/youtubeId.ts: Extracts YouTube video IDs, validates URLs, and generates fallback YouTube search URLs.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite environment variable types for the frontend.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, plugins, colors, animations, and content paths.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build files, enabling strict mode and composite builds.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config defining React plugin, path aliases, build output settings, chunking, and dev server options.
project_state.json: Maintains project state metadata including existing features for showing a live deployment URL and QR code, plus one pending feature request. Tracks versions, issues, and basic project info.
